UAE says mediation efforts led to Russia, Ukraine swap of 100 prisoners eachThe United Arab Emirates said it succeeded in mediating the release of 100 Russian prisoners of war in exchange for 100 war prisoners from the Ukrainian side. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 07:17:15 GMT ZZE53LGRJFMCDBH3HWMZC3OP6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/uae-says-mediation-efforts-led- Russia-ukraine-swap-100-prisoners-each-2024-02-09/Reuters世界欧洲
Young Indonesians wary of election promises as jobs boom eludes themAdrian graduated from an Indonesian auto mechanic trade school last summer, but since then has only worked a few weeks in one job: serving fruit juice at a kiosk in downtown Jakarta. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 07:13:43 GMT Q57K3HVHIJKAVI7B6JYIJP7RLE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/young-indonesians-wary-election-promises-jobs-boom-eludes-them-2024-02-09/Gayatri Suroyo, Fransiska Nangoy世界亚太地区
What did Putin say on war and peace, WW3 and AI?Russian President Vladimir Putin spoke in an interview published on Friday about war and peace in Ukraine, the risks of advances in genetics and artificial intelligence and fears of a world war. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 07:04:38 GMT LNM2F2ZA2NIZROCXCDJILCPW7U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/what-did-putin-say-war-peace-ww3-ai-2024-02-09/Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Swiss police kill axe-wielding hostage taker on trainSwiss police said a 32-year-old Iranian asylum seeker armed with an axe and a knife held 15 hostages on a train between Baulmes and Yverdon-les-Bains for almost four hours, until police stormed the train and killed the man late on Thursday. Fire extinguished at Russia's Ilsky oil refinery - authoritiesA fire broke out at the Ilsky oil refinery in Russia's southern Krasnodar region and was extinguished in about two hours, regional authorities said on Friday, but gave no details of what caused the fire or its impact on the refinery's output. Indonesia poll projects Prabowo gaining majority votes in presidential electionIndonesian presidential contender Prabowo Subianto is projected to pip the 50% threshold needed to win the Feb. 14 election in a single round, the latest opinion poll showed on Friday. Biden says Gaza fighting 'over the top,' pushing for a pauseU.S. President Joe Biden on Thursday suggested that Israel's military response in Gaza has been "over the top" and said he is seeking a "sustained pause in the fighting" to help ailing Palestinian civilians.
